findings.lower_thorax: Minimal dependent atelectasis at the lung bases on both sides, right greater than left.
findings.liver: Normal signal, no focal hepatic lesions.
findings.biliary: Moderately distended gallbladder with mild edema within the gallbladder wall, minimal pericholecystic stranding, layering sludge versus stones; no intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilation.
findings.pancreas: Pancreas divisum present, normal pancreatic duct morphology, homogeneous enhancement of pancreatic parenchyma.
findings.kidneys: No hydronephrosis or solid enhancing renal mass, 2 cm right renal lower pole cortical cyst with thin enhancing internal septation, bilateral parapelvic cysts.
findings.lymph_nodes: Normal sized lymph nodes at the porta hepaticus.
findings.vasculature: Normal hepatic arterial anatomy, patent portal vein and renal arteries.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A six-month follow-up ultrasound is recommended to reevaluate stability and any change in internal morphology of the renal cyst.
